name: Clever Kids: Pirates
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

"Hi, I'm Sprocket...Join me on a deadly voyage to Pirate Cove where we'll meet Blackbeard, Captain Morgan and other dreaded buccaneers. Learn about their perilous adventures and live the life of a Pirate Captain!"
  • Play a host of fun games: Search for buried treasure, build pirate-puzzles, fire cannons, play the Pirate Quiz and much more!
  • Clever Kids games make learning and development fun for all ages.
